name: Whack A Slime
description:
Don't panic, but slimes are in you basement!, do something before they take over your home! Quick!

My submission for this year's devtober, a short and simple prototype which may evolve into something bigger some day.

Controls

Move with WAD or the arrows,

Attack with 'J'

Dodge with either S andD keys, or left and right arrows

Dodge properly! Be careful where the enemy is aiming at!
